summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of German teacher work plan app (PlanEd) notification bell and sharing features. All core features working correctly with proper German localization.
passed_tests: Notification dropdown shows 'Keine Benachrichtigungen' when empty
Sharing page accessible via nav-sharing navigation
Share modal opens when 'Freigeben' button is clicked
Share modal email input field functional
Share modal edit permission checkbox functional
All UI texts properly displayed in German
